content: on top step 2 stitch the front legs to the body using yarn color a i like to have the body at an angle forward it looks more froglike and gives a bigger spot on the head for the hat sew the front legs between row 11 and 20 3 stitches apart step 3 stitch the back legs to the body using yarn color a position the top part of the leg above row 22 bend the leg so that the foot is also above row 22 equally spaced apart from the front legs they sit lower than the front feet which is needed for the body to tilt forward sew only the top 3 and bottom 3 row of the legs to the body so that the middle part can stick out a little bit fabulous freddie © 2024 acanthus crochet 13 step 4 secure the eyeballs into the eyelids using the long tail make sure the safety eye is in the center now stitch the eyes to the body position them on either side of row 2 on the body step 5 embroider a little mouth between row 8-10 at a diagonal line across two stitches using yarn color c step 6 sew the hat to the back of the head fabulous freddie © 2024 acanthus crochet 14 the end your fabulous freddie is now complete and i hope he brings you lots of joy you are welcome to sell completed toys but please give credit for the design to acanthus crochet i would love to see pictures of your projects on etsy ravelry facebook or instagram if you use these platforms but once again please remember to tag or link to acanthus crochet facebook page acanthus crochet instagram @acanthuscrochetdesigns ravelry acanthus crochet etsy acanthuscrochet youtube @acanthuscrochet the copyright for the pattern and all images in this document belong to annalize rheeder of acanthus crochet the pattern or any parts of it are not to be distributed copied or sold without the permission of the copyright owner the final product contains small elements which could become a choking hazard if they were to come loose for this reason the toy is not suitable for small children fabulous freddie © 2024 acanthus crochet 15
